package.name: net.sfmultimedia.argonaut
package.shortDescription: Argonaut provides AMF-style class serialization/deserialization between AS3 and JSON objects.
package.description: Argonaut provides AMF-style class serialization/deserialization between AS3 and JSON objects. It leverages the built-in JSON class in Flex SDK 4.6. If your project requires an older SDK, see the companion project argonaut_non-native-.01.
